transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Sir, Namaste.
Executive: Hmm, boliye. Aapne jawab de diya, maine sun liya, theek hai.
Customer: Are sir, ab aap sune toh sahi, mai uss samay kya bolna chah raha tha.
Executive: Hmm, boliye. Ek bari baat toh complete kar lene de.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kya hota hai na, dekhiye aap bhi buyer ke liye ho yaha pe, right?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh sabse pehle priority buyer ke liye hai. Ab maan lijiye aap bhi yaha pe, hum aapki bhi help karte. Ab let suppose ki aap humare paas mein as a buyer hote, right?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur aapne IndiaMART ke kisi bhi paid client se aapne koi samaan kharida.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai? Toh aap bhi mere liye as a buyer hote. Hai na? Tab bhi koi problem hoti toh IndiaMART bilkul help karti. Aur abhi toh complaint aayi hai, humare batane ka yeh matlab nahi tha ki hum aapko kisi bhi mamle mein koi bhi cheez mein hum galat keh rahe.
Executive: Haan. Right? Humara simple sa yeh tha intimation ki sir dekhiye humare paas mein aisi complaint aayi hai toh please aap isko dekh lijiye, aap isko look after kar lijiye. Right? Hai na? Humara sirf matlab yeh tha, kyuki agar mai baad mein nahi batata, kal ko koi dikkat hoti toh phir aap hume hi bolte.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh woh sirf ek intimation ke liye gaya hua tha. Maine bhi aapko yeh bola dekhiye har buyer sahi nahi hota. Hai na? Toh buyer bhi pareshan karta hai aur jaan bujh ke pareshan karta. Toh jaise aap bol rahe the na ki aap problem mein fas gaye the, thodi delivery aapki late ho gayi. Toh kabhi bhi kisi bhi buyer se aap deal karte ho na, toh pehle hi aap written statement mein de dijiye ki humara delivery ka itna time lag sakta hai, hum aise advance lete hai.
Executive: Hum log isko pehle nahi samjhaye sir.
Customer: Sorry sir?
Executive: Door se aane mein itna time lagta hai.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan. Matlab door se aane mein time lagta hai, mai toh maal...
Customer: Aha. Toh aise isme koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai sir. Dekho aap yaha paise liye ho toh aap usko samaan doge. Thoda bahut upar neeche chal jata hai. Koi buyer patience hota hai, kisi buyer mein toh woh koi kuch nahi kehta. Kisi buyer mein patience nahi hota hai toh woh complaint raise karta hai. Complaint raise kar raha hai toh hum aisa thodi keh rahe hai ki hum aapko blame kar rahe hai ki nahi sir aap aisa kar rahe ho, aap jaan bujh ke kar rahe ho. Humara kabhi koi aisa intention nahi rehta.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Hai na? As a IndiaMART mediator hum koshish karte hai ki aap dono ki cheeze solve ho jaye, taki aap bhi humare liye bahut premium customer value karte hai aur buyer humare liye already premium hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Right? Hum apni taraf se best try karte hai. Baki sir aap mujhe services mein bataye, services mein kahi kisi tarah ka koi issue aa raha hai?
Executive: Nahi filhaal koi issue nahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Service vagerah achi chal rahi hai?
Customer: Theek hai, abhi mai khud hi itna dhyan nahi de raha hu.
Executive: Lead vagerah toh conjunction aapki kaafi achi hai. Ek problem hai sir aapki na review rating jo hai jo buyer aapko rate karta hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Woh 16 buyer ne abhi tak aapko rate kara hai aur rating sirf aapki 3.4 hai.
Customer: Haan, iska thoda dhyan rakhenge.
Executive: Haan, toh please jo bhi customer se ab dekhiye jisne kam de diya usko toh aap kuch kar nahi sakte. Aap unse request kar sakte hai agar woh change kar de toh. If in case nahi karta hai toh aap please jitne bhi buyers se aapki discussion hoti hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Better discussion hoti hai. Aap unko bole apne catalog ko review karne ke liye, aapke catalog ko rating dene ke liye. Kyuki aaj ke time pe it is very very important kyuki aap bhi Amazon se kuch kharidte honge ya Flipkart se kuch kharidte honge, aap bhi as a buyer act karte honge toh review aap zarur dekhte honge.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Right?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Toh please aap review dekha kare. Baki koi lead manager mein, direct inquiry mein ya PNS matlab call vagerah mein kahi koi problem aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi mujhe koi takleef nahi hai.
Executive: Sab kuch theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sir hum sorry aapko agar kuch aisa laga. Lekin please humara koi aisa intention nahi rehta hai. Hum sirf aapko initiate kar rahe the, intimate kar rahe the ki sir aisi aisi dikkat aayi hai toh please aap usko look after kar lo.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Sir aapka ek product hai direct poplin fabric, isme aap deal nahi kar rahe ho kya? Out of stock mark karke rakha hai aapne?
Customer: Na na aisa kuch nahi hai. Poplin cotton ka hi kaam hai mera.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Isi ka toh kaam hai humara, out of stock nahi hoga dekhiye.
Executive: Out of stock kara hua hai toh mai isko in stock kar du?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second hold kijiye sir. Aapke do char products aur I think out of stock mark kara hua hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Ek second hold kijiyega. Aur usme aapne bahut achi khasi buylead bhi purchase kari hai. Aapke total jo hai nau product abhi inactive list mein hai.
Customer: Kaun kaun se naam bataiye.
Executive: Isme lekin photos vagerah updated nahi hai. Petticoat fabric hai, poplin fabric hai, vimal plus poplin fabric, petticoat fabric. Yeh band maine nahi kiya hoga, mai toh kabhi iska dhyan nahi deta hu, band chalu ka.
Customer: Lekin toh yeh sab mein aap deal karte ho?
Customer: Haan, yeh sab main hai. Yeh koi before that kuch hua hoga mai toh. Yeh sab product na, mai aapko wohi bata raha hu, yeh sab product na mai dekhiye mai sara in stock kar de raha hu. Lekin yeh sab product na pure tarike se updated nahi hai.
Executive: Accha theek hai.
Executive: Toh inka specification, inka images, inke detailing vagerah sab aapko update karna padega. Agar aap online hai toh bataye abhi update kar lete hai, abhi mai aapko guide kar deta hu. Mujhe aata hai, mujhe aata hai.
Customer: Accha update karna aata hai na pura aapko?
Customer: Ji ji mujhe aata hai. Toh isme jab aap product mein jayenge na toh wahi pe aapko dikh jayega no photo karke, us pe click kijiye ga, sara ka photo dal dijiyega, sari ke description vagerah aur sara ka specification vagerah dal dijiyega.
Executive: Haan. Right?
Executive: Ji ji. Baki aap please chinta na kare sir, hum aap hi ke side mein hai.
Executive: Right? Aur sir bahut sare product mein na sirf ek ek keyword hi updated hai. Toh hum do do keyword update kar sakte hai. Aapka description pure tarike se sare product mein updated nahi hai, sara specification updated nahi hai. Toh ek bari agar aap online aa sakte hai toh aa jaiye mai aapko guide kar deta hu. Abhi toh mai bank hu, ghar jaake phir mai aapko bol dunga 4:30 baje.
Executive: Haan, kabhi aap online aayenge toh update kar dijiyega, nahi toh aapko toh aata hai update karna, woh update kar dijiyega, theek hai? Baki aapne yeh concern open kara tha, yeh mai close kar raha hu. Koi dikkat ho sir aapke paas mein feedback ke liye jayega, please feedback zarur dijiyega aur koi dikkat ho toh aapka mera number aapke paas mein hai, aap mujhe directly connect kar sakte ho.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai?
Executive: Haan. Okay sir, thank you sir, have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was informed about a complaint.

- Review ratings are low (3.4).

- Nine products are in inactive list.

- Products are not completely updated.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the complaint intimation.

- Executive explained the importance of review ratings.

- Executive made the products in stock.

- Executive offered guidance on updating product details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update product details later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, review rating, product update, buyleads
